name: Deduction (itch)
description:
Deduction is a point and click game you are detective Phillips and you must solve the mystery of the deaths of George Humphry ,James Baxter and Flora Dunsworth . Go through the houses searching for clues and talking to the witnesses. Once you've think you know who done it and why click the police shield make your theory and click the handcuff icon to make the arrest. 

Keys -

Mouse click or Space to move through dialogues

M - turn off music
